platform.game.linkable

Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.game.Actor
      • platform.game.block.Block
        • platform.game.linkable.Door
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Actor>, Linkable, Signal

    public class Door
extends Block
implements Signal, Linkable
    A Door is a block that disappears when then Signal it is linked to tells it to.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean linkable
      Signifies whether the Door has to begin the linking process
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      private Signal signal
      Used to store the Signal
      private Signal signalTemp
      Used to store the temporary signal while the Actor is in linking process with other Signals.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Door(Box box, java.lang.String sprite, boolean linkable)
      Constructor where no signal is given (null is sent to the full constructor)
      Door(Box box, java.lang.String sprite, Signal signal)
      Constructor where we do not tell whether it is linkable (then it is not linkable)
      Door(Box box, java.lang.String sprite, Signal signal, boolean linkable)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Door

        public Door(Box box,
            java.lang.String sprite,
            Signal signal,
            boolean linkable)
        Full constructor
        Parameters:
        box - Position and size parameters of the Door.
        sprite - Sprite of the Door.
        signal - Signal to be linked to the door. If null, create a Constant.
        linkable - True if we'd like to link the door to its signal

      • Door

        public Door(Box box,
            java.lang.String sprite,
            boolean linkable)
        Constructor where no signal is given (null is sent to the full constructor)
        Parameters:
        box - Position and size parameters of the Door.
        sprite - Sprite of the Door.
        linkable - Indicates whether the Door needs to be linked or not.

      • Door

        public Door(Box box,
            java.lang.String sprite,
            Signal signal)
        Constructor where we do not tell whether it is linkable (then it is not linkable)
        Parameters:
        box - Position and size parameters of the Door.
        sprite - Sprite of the Door.
        signal - Signal linked to the Door.

      • register

        public void register(World world)
        The following method has to be overridden to register all the signals it contains so it can be loaded in the new world and be visible.
        Specified by:
        register in interface Signal
        Overrides:
        register in class Actor
        Parameters:
        world - Instance of world which will be linked to the Actor.
        See Also:
        Simulator

      • unregister

        public void unregister()
        The following method has to be overridden to unregister all the signals it contains so it can be saved.
        Overrides:

      • addSignal

        public void addSignal(Signal signal)
        The following method has to be overridden to unregister all the signals it contains so it can be loaded in the new world and be visible.
        Specified by:
        addSignal in interface Linkable
        Parameters:
        signal - Signal which needs to be added to the Linkable
